env.SPARK_OPTS: --master yarn-client --conf spark.driver.maxResultSize=0 --conf spark.serializer=org.apache.spark.serializer.KryoSerializer --conf spark.dynamicAllocation.enabled=true --conf spark.shuffle.service.enabled=true --conf spark.rdd.compress=true --conf spark.dynamicAllocation.maxExecutors=30 --conf spark.dynamicAllocation.executorIdleTimeout=20 --conf spark.dynamicAllocation.cachedExecutorIdleTimeout=600
